author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Department of Posts, in tie up with Global Media Innovations, will release a ‘Hot Air Balloon Carried Cover’ in Pollachi on January 3.

According to a press release here, the cover will be released at the Pollachi Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

A cover will be flagged off from Mahalingapuram at 6.30 a.m. and it will be flown in a hot air balloon to Kovilpalyaam.

The Kovilpalayam Post Office will deliver the mail.
title: Special cover to be released
